name: Sample Case 1: Collection Account with Re-aging Indicators
description: A de-identified example showing a collection account with a date opened significantly after the DOFD, suggesting potential re-aging.
raw_text:
COLLECTIONS

Creditor: ABC COLLECTIONS INC
Original Creditor: EXAMPLE BANK NA
Account Type: Collection
Account Status: Open

Date Opened: 03/15/2023
Date of First Delinquency: 01/20/2019
Date Reported: 11/01/2023
Balance: $2,450
Original Amount: $1,875

Estimated date of removal: 03/2030

Reported by: Experian

This account is scheduled to continue on record until 03/2030.
notes: This sample demonstrates multiple re-aging indicators: The date opened (2023) is over 4 years after the DOFD (2019), and the estimated removal date (2030) is 11 years after the original delinquency instead of the legally mandated ~7 years.
